front.title: ISO/IEC/IEEE International Standard -- Information technology -- Telecommunications and information exchange between systems -- Local and metropolitan area networks -- Specific requirements -- Part 1Q: Bridges and bridged networks AMENDMENT 3: Enhancements for scheduled traffic

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks (virtual LANs)
front.abstract: Enhancements to the forwarding process that supports scheduled traffic is provided in this amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q-2014.
